attributes.action: Ask the London 2012 Organising committee to reconsider the logo chosen for the games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new brand/vision/logo for the London 2012 Olympic Games and Paralympic was unveiled today.  It is awful and I can't quite believe that it isn't April Fool's Day.  Please sign the petition if you agree that we have to come up with something better than this!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
